The Development, Cost, and Impact of a Current Awareness Service in an Industrial Town .A Bowman, C.M. Brown, M.T. The development of a current awareness system in The Dow Chemical Company has resulted in four established services, one based on internal information and the other three on Chemical Abstracts.  In addition several other services are now being tried or considered.  The operation of such a service is expensive, but the willingness of the user to pay for it and responses to a survey indicate that it is a useful and worthwhile tool to the scientist and engineer.  The use of such services also has a significant effect on other established information services. .X 18	2	723 34	1	723 49	1	723 53	1	723 59	1	723 74	1	723 83	1	723 125	1	723 145	1	723 161	1	723 164	1	723 197	1	723 202	1	723 211	1	723 213	1	723 224	1	723 243	1	723 245	1	723 273	1	723 279	1	723 288	1	723 331	1	723 375	1	723 378	1	723 381	2	723 408	1	723 421	1	723 440	1	723 445	1	723 452	1	723 453	1	723 454	1	723 465	1	723 466	1	723 467	1	723 468	1	723 472	1	723 490	3	723 491	1	723 495	1	723 496	1	723 503	1	723 506	3	723 507	2	723 508	1	723 510	1	723 511	1	723 512	2	723 514	1	723 517	1	723 520	1	723 521	1	723 523	1	723 524	1	723 526	1	723 528	1	723 554	1	723 576	1	723 579	1	723 580	1	723 591	3	723 592	1	723 593	1	723 594	1	723 595	2	723 596	1	723 597	1	723 599	1	723 600	1	723 603	2	723 604	3	723 606	1	723 609	1	723 612	1	723 619	1	723 622	2	723 623	2	723 629	2	723 631	1	723 632	1	723 633	2	723 639	1	723 659	1	723 676	1	723 688	1	723 699	1	723 700	1	723 705	1	723 707	1	723 711	1	723 722	1	723 723	7	723 724	2	723 726	2	723 727	1	723 728	2	723 729	1	723 730	3	723 731	2	723 732	1	723 754	1	723 801	1	723 805	1	723 806	1	723 809	1	723 810	1	723 812	1	723 813	2	723 814	2	723 820	2	723 822	2	723 828	1	723 834	1	723 836	1	723 860	1	723 866	2	723 867	1	723 870	2	723 873	1	723 879	1	723 925	1	723 956	1	723 957	1	723 976	1	723 989	1	723 1078	1	723 1089	1	723 1091	2	723 1143	1	723 1148	1	723 1227	1	723 1264	1	723 1283	1	723 1298	2	723 1299	2	723 1302	1	723 1303	1	723 1317	1	723 1327	1	723 1353	1	723 1359	1	723 1360	1	723 1363	1	723 1366	2	723 1367	2	723 1368	2	723 1396	2	723 1400	1	723 1405	1	723 1410	1	723 1424	1	723 1424	1	723
